title: What's News: Business & Finance
text:
Fed officials expressed greater concern at their meeting this month about how long inflation would stay elevated and discussed whether they should prepare to raise rates in the first half of next year to cool off the economy.

AT&T and Verizon said they would limit some of their 5G wireless services for six months while federal regulators review the signals' effect on aircraft sensors.

The economy showed broad-based signs of acceleration heading into the end of the year, with consumers ramping up spending, businesses stepping up investment and jobless claims falling to historic lows.

What's News: Business & Finance
